description: Apparently this zombie was doing time when the Cataclysm struck.  It wears black and white striped prisoner clothes, and tattoos can be seen on its decaying skin.
This muscular zombie wears black and white striped prisoner clothes.
This zombie's flesh bulges out around its black and white striped prisoner clothes.  Strange nodules, pustules and growths decorate what skin you can see.
This tough-looking zombie wears black and white striped prisoner clothes.
